assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Procedures were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Human Research Ethics Committee of the Royal Children’s Hospital, Melbourne (HREC/22073). WGS was performed as part of the Mitochondrial Flagship study of the Australian Genomics Health Alliance research project, which also has Human Research Ethics Committee approval (HREC/16/MH251).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from all participants.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Participants consented to publication of non-identifiable data.

funder.name: National Health and Medical Research Council
